text: Soni munkumbuchilani (Hudu) nnongo n’jao achina Adi; ndema jawatetele wandu wakwe pa Al-Ahqaf (chiwata chamasugulu ga nsanga kumwela kwa chilumba cha Warabu), soni chisimu waapiite akutetela wajinji paujo pakwe ni panyuma pakwe; (ni jwasalile kuti): “Ngasin’galagatila (jwinepe) akaweje Allah, chisimu une ngun’jogopela jenumanja ilagasyo ya lisiku lyekulungwa nnope.”
